COMMENT  
 
After  graduat ing with an  MEng in Chemical Engineering from The University of 
Birmingham, he has spent  the past couple  of years  working  as a Project  Engineer  for 
Projex  Solutions  Limited . He has a passion  for problem -solving  and have  been  able to 
apply  the knowledge  gained  from his degree  to real-world  engineering  situations.  
Alongside this role, he completed  a Level 4 Associate Project Manager  Apprenticeship , 
which improved his ability  to manage projects within chemical, energy, pharmaceutical 
and FMCG industries .
